### Rectifiers, Inverters, Converters and Power Components
[Request for Proposals (RFP) Notification](#)

**Solicitation Number:** 202103640/A  
**Publication Date:** September 19, 2022  
**Closing Date and Time:** November 1, 2022, 2:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time)  

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites [Request for Proposals (RFP)] bids for the procurement of components for backup power systems at various radio sites in Nunavut.

**Summary**

*   The RCMP requires rectifiers, inverters, converters, and power components to support backup power systems at multiple radio sites in Nunavut.
*   The successful bidder(s) will be awarded a contract with an initial term of one (1) year, commencing on the date of contract award, with up to three (3) additional one (1) year extensions and additional optional quantities.
*   Tender submissions must be submitted electronically by November 1, 2022, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time).

**Eligibility Criteria**

Registered bidders must be in good standing with the Canadian Government and meet all prescribed standards and guidelines.

**RFP Documents**

*   [RFP 202103640/A - Rectifiers, Inverters, Converters and Power Components](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/19/ebeac429b6b91b8af4f0330701e41a86/202103640_final_rfp_eng.pdf) (English)
*   [RFP 202103640/A - Redresseurs, convertisseurs, onduleurs et composants électriques](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/19/a81c5fc9b7fe07f753b64e2ab747b47e/202103640_final_rfp_fre.pdf) (French)

**Contact Information**

To obtain further information or to request an RFP, please contact:

*   **Name:** Allen, Michelle
*   **Email:** Michelle.Allen@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
*   **Phone:** 343-572-4945
